name: The Art of Screenshake Recreation
description:
I'm a first time dev since April 2020 and very inspired by the famous "The Art of Screenshake" talk. As I wrap up my own development, I feel like I should create something to help newcomers check out how the juice can impact gameplay.

So, I made an executable with an array of tools to toggle juice on and off for game feel comparison. Hope you have fun with it!

You can check out a quick breakdown of all the effects step by step here.
